messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Quarter Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, not more than 15 wire eating mammals have migrated into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Easter Station Beta have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Easter Station Beta. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: THERE ARE TOXIC AND UNTOXIC VINES ON THE STATION, THEY MUST BE COOPERATIVLEY DESTROYED ASAP

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Atmospherics alert

The scrubbers network is experiencing a backpressure surge. Some ejection of contents may occur.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the approaching space vines we have sent vine fighting equipment to departures

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Medical Officer's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Fluffy Alert

Unidentified furry objects detected coming aboard Easter Station Beta. Beware of Adorable-ness.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we sent flamethrowers to the chapel use them!!!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Easter Station Beta. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.
